vignette.name: Project Open Actions
vignette.bodytext:
To open the Project Open Actions, click on the "gear" menu in the Project window toolbar and choose Open Actions. A text window will open, ready for editing.
You can write various messages to the 'max', 'dsp' or 'jitter' objects in this window. When the Project is loaded (or reloaded via the "Reload Project" button in the Project toolbar), the Open Actions will be executed. For instance, the actions shown above will enable Overdrive (;max overdrive 1) and Scheduler in Audio Interrupt (;dsp takeover 1) every time the Project is (re)loaded.
